Posts.Content: PSA & questions Thread: PSA & questions Reply to Thread Subscribe to this Thread Tags: None Hopey said: Today*11:16 AM PSA & questions I should know the answer (my husband had prostate cancer)...My uncle went in and Dr. said he had infection (enlarged prostate) he did a CT scan on him, he's finished taking his antibiotics for infection. The Dr. called & said his PSA is 16.9, Dr. wants him to come in for an MRI. Im confused, if he does have cancer why arent they doing a biopsy? what is the MRI for?....any thoughts Id appreciate immensely.... *
Posts.Title: PSA & questions

Posts.Content: I should know the answer (my husband had prostate cancer)...My uncle went in and Dr. said he had infection (enlarged prostate) he did a CT scan on him, he's finished taking his antibiotics for infection. The Dr. called & said his PSA is 16.9, Dr. wants him to come in for an MRI. Im confused, if he does have cancer why arent they doing a biopsy? what is the MRI for?....any thoughts Id appreciate immensely....
